table.name: vtiger_mdi
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_mdi` ( `mdiid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `title` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `folderid` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_mdicf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_mdicf` ( `mdiid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`mdiid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
